name: European Collaborative Economy Forum
goal: The European Collaborative Economy Forum provides a neutral place for industry and policy makers to come together to explore the current and future policy and regulatory landscape of the collaborative economy. The Forumâ€™s aim is to help create a strong and competitive industry for the benefit of platforms, users and European consumers. The Forum is funded by a collection of like minded companies, who believe that co-operation and exchange of ideas are paramount to furthering the collaborative economy in Europe.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market Strategy
Internal Market Strategy
Platform Consultation
Tax policy
Social Pillar
